title: Slone & Co. Funeral Directors
content: Dominic Carlos Pedro passed away December 23, 2016. Loving son to Jose Sr. & Nekia Pedro, Dear brother to Jose Pedro Jr., Nicholas Huynh & Isaiah Pedro. Loving grandson to Ana Pedro, Linda Wiseman and Sandra Roy and the late Rafael Pedro. Dear nephew to Carlos Pedro (Jill) and the late Albert Pedro. Nephew to many Aunt’s & Uncle’s. Family and friends are welcome on Wednesday December 28, 2016 from 4 to 8 pm at the Slone & Co. Funeral Directors 13115 Lorain Avenue, Cleveland, Ohio where funeral services will be held Thursday 11 am. Interment Holy Cross Cemetery.
